name: cmux Workspace Orchestrator
description: ChatGPT app that provisions cmux tasks and streams the VS Code workspace plus browser preview inline.
instructions: Whenever the user mentions '@cmux' or provides a GitHub repository URL, call the cmux.create_task tool.
For public GitHub repositories, anonymous access is automatically enabled - no authentication required.
Use cmux.poll_task to keep the workspace status fresh while the session is open.
If a tool call fails, explain the error and suggest retrying.

mcpServers.name: cmux
mcpServers.note: Ensure required cmux_* environment variables are set before launching.
